detail_desc: Fully lined bikini. Top with wide shoulder straps and a racer back with a cut-out section and wide elastic hem. Bottoms with a wide elastic waistband.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar and an opening with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top of the front, a gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with covered buttons. Wide fit with a seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Loafers with rounded, slightly pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Round, lace-trimmed neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties, short sleeves and a skirt with lace-trimmed, gathered tiers. Unlined.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Ribbed top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small ribbed stand-up collar. Narrow cut at the top and frills around the armholes.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
A pair of long metal earrings decorated with narrow metal chains, pearly plastic beads and polished plastic stones.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.
Short shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets.
Long-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in an organic cotton weave with two chest pockets, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a button placket, chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge ribbing around the neckline and ribbed cuffs.
Fully lined sports bra in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that split into three at the back, and an elasticated hem. Light support.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.

prod_name: PELLE Basic S/S jersey polo SB
detail_desc: Polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless dress in satin with a scallop-edged neckline, and a gentle V-neck and visible zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined bodice.
Dress in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable braided belt in imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the back, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect. Long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Trousers in a viscose weave with a sheen. Elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs with decorative piping at the hems.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Treggings in stretch twill with fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Jacket in woven fabric with a small print motif at the top. Detachable, jersey-lined hood, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top.

Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Handbag in grained imitation leather with two handles and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap. Two outer compartments and a lined inner compartment with a zip at the top. Press-stud closures and studs at the base. Size 14x24x34 cm.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes and covered block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyurethane content of the skirt is water-based and free from DMF.
5-pocket trousers in soft imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, and wide, extra-long legs.
Short skirt in textured jersey with concealed elastication at the waist.
Vest top in soft linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a sequin motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace details, a high waist, lined gusset and full coverage at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Romper suit in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif and appliqués. Short sleeves and short legs, all with sewn-in turn-ups and press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch.
Vest top in cotton jersey.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and a lace trim at the top.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave containing some wool with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0451290.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide panel and concealed key pocket.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in a heavily draping rib knit with a collar, V-neck, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with a double-layered turtle neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Top in soft pile with long sleeves, a hood with appliqués, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, straight-cut dress in pattern-weave fabric with a sheen decorated with plastic sparkly stones front and back. Boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Tiered skirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Patterned dress in sturdy, jacquard-weave jersey with a round neck and a yoke and concealed zip at the back. 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Swim pants and a patterned swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with a small stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Pants with a frill at the top and a lined gusset. UPF 50.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist and lined gusset.

Blouse in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with embroidery and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons, a seam at the waist with elastication and an open section at the back, and a peplum. Unlined.

Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with a padded edge in felted fabric. Lacing at the front, a zip in one side and welt seams around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.

Sleeveless dress in lightweight cotton canvas with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that join at the back. Buttons down the front, narrow elastication at the top of the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Straight-cut shirt in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a fluffy finish. V-neck with an asymmetric edge, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides and gathered seams at the back.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Waistcoat in fine-knit premium cotton with a rib-trimmed V-neck and ribbing around the armholes.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
